title: Backend Engineer
description: I am proficient in creating REST APIs in various languages/frameworks, including Go and Node.js, and writing database queries for relational or non-relational databases. I also have a strong foundation in backend system design, cloud services such as AWS, and testing & quality assurance.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: I am experienced in creating neural networks with deep learning libraries (PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc) and preprocessing/cleaning data which includes handling missing values, scaling, normalization, and feature engineering. I also have a strong mathematical foundation in calculus, probability, statistics, and linear algebra.

title: Frontend Engineer
description: I am experienced in creating responsive frontend applications for the web and mobile devices using JavaScript/TypeScript, React.js, and React Native.
